title: Cannot buy Wooglet's witchcap
body: Hi everyone. I can't find Wooglet's Witchcap in the store on the Rift. is it supposed to be there?

replies.body:
Hey keepingreal,

This item is only available on Twisted Treeline and Dominion. 

Thanks for reporting that it's coming up in 'Item Sets'. We'll see what's happening there.
wooglet isnt available on summoners rift, its only on twisted treeline and i think howling abyss.

Thank you!

*Edit*

i wish it said that in the item description in the "Item Sets" Tab in the client.
